[vc_column_text]“I am not satisfied that you will leave Canada at the end of your stay.”

Thousands of prospective international students receive admission to Canada’s prestigious Colleges and Universities each year. These students must apply for a Canadian student visa and study permit to be able to enter the country and attend school. However, they must meet many strict requirements before being approved.

One of these is convincing Immigration, Refugees, and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) officials that they will leave Canada after completing their studies. This guide will go over nine possible ways to demonstrate this.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Business Assessment for Investment Visa” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/business-immigration-assessment/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

The Biggest Reasons Why Study Permit Applications are Rejected

Foreign students are most likely to have their Canada study permit applications rejected if they cannot convince IRCC officials that they will leave the country after completing their studies. If such students inquire about the reason for their rejection, they will typically receive statements such as:

“I am not satisfied that you will leave Canada at the end of your stay.” or

“The purpose of your visit to Canada is not consistent with a temporary stay.”

Receiving a Canadian study permit rejection can devastate prospective international students because it delays their pursuit of higher education in Canada. Luckily, there are many ways to demonstrate your intent to leave Canada after finishing your educational program.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”13077″ animation=”Fade In From Right” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

9 Ways to Prove You Will Leave Canada at the End of Studies

These are the nine ways to prove that you will leave Canada at the end of your study.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

1. A Positive Travel History

A positive travel history is a great way to show off that you can be trusted to leave Canada after finishing your studies. This strategy is helpful if you have visited multiple countries and have an excellent track record of abiding by visa expiration dates.

2. Employment/Career

IRCC officers wish to prevent people from coming to Canada and working there illegally. For this reason, they might reject Canada study permit applicants who are presently unemployed.

You can avoid this problem by demonstrating that you are currently employed at a business or company in your home country. This includes providing a letter from your employer that states you are taking a temporary leave of absence to pursue studies in Canada and intend to return to work afterward.

3. Property Ownership

Showing your property is an excellent way to show your intent to return to your home country. This is because property is valuable, and most people aren’t willing to abandon such assets to live in another country illegally. For this reason, you can provide mortgage documents or land deeds with your application.

4. Investments

Showing investment statements is also a great way to demonstrate your ties to your home country. This shows that you have funds tied up in different places in your home country, and you aren’t willing to leave these behind by escaping to Canada on a student visa.

You can show any investment statement for this purpose. This includes:

  • Bank statements
  • Financial investments
  • Business investments

Read more: Proof of Financial Support for Canadian Student Visa

5. Spouse and Children

Demonstrating you have a spouse and children in your home country is an excellent way to satisfy an officer that you will leave Canada at the end of your studies. After all, people do not want to abandon their families to pursue a new life in a different country.

If applicable, you can show proof of your spouse and children by providing a marriage certificate and your children’s birth certificates.

6. Other Family Ties

If you aren’t married or have children, you still demonstrate other types of family ties. For example, you can show that you have parents or siblings in your home country that need to be looked after. This approach will be more convincing if you can demonstrate there is no one around to take care of them.

7. Business

Owning a business is one of the best ways to convince Canadian immigration officers that you intend to stay in Canada temporarily. This is because businesses are huge investments, and most people won’t allow something they have put so much money and effort into to close down in their absence.

You can show proof you own a business by providing the following with your application:

  • Business ownership papers
  • Tax statements
  • Business incorporation documents
  • Document detailing your business structure

8. Membership and Involvement

If you’re a member of various organizations in your community, you might be able to use this as proof you intend to return to your home country. For example, you could be one of the head organizers for a prominent charity group or a co-founder of a minority rights group.

9. Strong Passport

Having a strong passport is an easy method that requires no additional effort. People with solid passports have a high chance of being approved for a Canada study permit due to what this passport signifies.

A passport’s power demonstrates the issuing country’s conditions and whether people are more likely to immigrate or emigrate from it. For example, countries such as Singapore and Japan have the world’s strongest passports. Therefore, people from such countries are unlikely to have their Canadian study permit applications rejected.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”13078″ animation=”Fade In From Right” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]
